Package chess.model.pieces

Class Bishop

java.lang.Object
chess.model.Colored
chess.model.pieces.Piece
chess.model.pieces.Bishop
All Implemented Interfaces:
chess.persistence.Codable
public final class Bishop extends Piece
A concrete subtype of Piece that represents a Bishop ( ♗ / ♝ ).

A Bishop conforms to all the generic rules of a Chess piece and has none of its own.

Movements that may be initiated by a Bishop:

  1. RegularMove: regular non-jumping diagonal moves;
  2. Capture: captures.

    • isAtAnInitialPosition

      public boolean isAtAnInitialPosition()
      A Bishop may be at its initial position only if it is at one of the following positions:
      • White: c1 (Queen-side), f1 (King-side)
      • Black: c8 (Queen-side), f8 (King-side)
      Specified by:
      isAtAnInitialPosition in class Piece
      Returns:
      A boolean value indicating whether this Bishop is at one of the initial positions above.
